// {{{ NX.Date.add

/**
 * @class NX.Date
 */

/**
 * @method add
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(date, interval, value) {

    var d = NX.Date.clone(date),
        Date = NX.Date;

    if(!interval || value === 0) {
        return d;
    }

    switch(interval.toLowerCase()) {

        case NX.Date.MILLI:
            d.setMilliseconds(d.getMilliseconds() + value);
            break;

        case NX.Date.SECOND:
            d.setSeconds(d.getSeconds() + value);
            break;

        case NX.Date.MINUTE:
            d.setMinutes(d.getMinutes() + value);
            break;

        case NX.Date.HOUR:
            d.setHours(d.getHours() + value);
            break;

        case NX.Date.DAY:
            d.setDate(d.getDate() + value);
            break;

        case NX.Date.MONTH:
            var day = date.getDate();

            if(day > 28) {
                day = Math.min(
                    day,
                    NX.Date.getLastDateOfMonth(
                        NX.Date.add(
                            NX.Date.getFirstDateOfMonth(date),
                            'mo',
                            value
                        )
                    ).getDate()
                );
            }

            d.setDate(day);
            d.setMonth(date.getMonth() + value);
            break;

        case NX.Date.YEAR:
            d.setFullYear(date.getFullYear() + value);
            break;
    }

    return d;
};

// }}}
